19EmptyScreen* empty_screen_alloc() {
20 EmptyScreen* empty_screen = malloc(sizeof(EmptyScreen));
21 empty_screen->view = view_alloc();
22 view_set_context(empty_screen->view, empty_screen);
23 view_set_draw_callback(empty_screen->view, empty_screen_view_draw_callback);
24 view_set_input_callback(empty_screen->view, empty_screen_view_input_callback);
25 return empty_screen;

28void empty_screen_free(EmptyScreen* empty_screen) {

32}
